long_description: The Electra Hawaii 3i women's cruiser bike pays homage to the Aloha state with a fun, laid-back ride, flower graphics and, of course, plenty of comfort. Flat Foot Technology(TM) geometry offers a relaxed, efficient pedaling position that also allows you to easily and comfortably put both feet down on the ground when stopped. Aluminum frame is resilient and is adorned with botanical-themed graphics; step-through design makes mounting and dismounting the bike quick and easy. SRAM i-Motion 3-speed internally geared rear hub with coaster brake offers silky-smooth shifting and low-maintenance stopping power. Easy-shifting twist shifter and comfortable ergonomic hand grips add cruising convenience and comfort. The painted-to-match chain cover and front and rear fenders prevent splashes and road grit from covering your clothing; saddle and grips complement the graphics. Platform pedals are compatible with most types of footwear-just hop on and go! Keep other cyclists and pedestrians apprised of your presence with the handlebar-mounted bell. One size fits most. Specs on the Electra Hawaii 3i women's cruiser bike are subject to change.
